info.title: Basecone API
info.description:
Basecone is a document processing and accounting platform by Wolters Kluwer.
This API provides access to manage suppliers, customers, transactions, documents,
and other accounting-related resources.

## Authentication
The API supports two authentication methods:
- **Basic Authentication**: Use your Client ID and API Access Key
- **Bearer Token**: Obtain a JWT token via the authentication endpoint

## Date/Time Format
All dates and times are in UTC using ISO 8601 format.

## Pagination
Collection endpoints support `limit` and `offset` query parameters.
Responses include `_metadata` with `total` and `count` fields.
